title: Rohit Sharma
summary: Rohit Gurunath Sharma (born 30 April 1987) is an Indian international cricketer who captains the India national cricket team in T20Is. He also plays for Mumbai in domestic cricket and captains Mumbai Indians in the Indian Premier League as a right-handed batsman and an occasional right-arm off break bowler. He is the vice-captain of the Indian national team in ODIs. He is widely regarded as one of the best openers of all time.[1][2][3]
